import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Table, Spinner, } from "react-bootstrap"; import api from "../../api"; import { useAuth } from "../../auth/AuthContext"; export default function CivilianDashboard() { const { user } = useAuth(); const [cases, setCases] = useState([]); const [payments, setPayments] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { const [caseRes, paymentRes] = await Promise.all([ api.get("/cases"), api.get("/payments"), ]); setCases(caseRes.data || []); setPayments(paymentRes.data || []); } catch (err) { console.error("‚ùå Error fetching dashboard data:", err); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchData(); }, []); return (

üëã Welcome, {user?.email}

Access all your case-related services here: file new cases, view hearing schedules, manage documents, upload evidence, track status, and check payments.

{loading ? (
) : ( <> {/* üîπ Quick Overview */} üìë Recent Cases {cases.length > 0 ? ( {cases.slice(0, 3).map((c, i) => ( ))}
# Case Title Status
{i + 1} {c.title} {c.status}
) : (

No cases filed yet.

)} üí≥ Latest Payments {payments.length > 0 ? ( {payments.slice(0, 3).map((p, i) => ( ))}
# Amount Status
{i + 1} ${p.amount} {p.status}
) : (

No payments yet.

)} {/* üîπ Navigation Cards to All Pages */} üìù File New Case üìÇ Upload Evidence üìä Case Status üìÖ Hearing Schedule üìë Court Documents üìÇ Case Details )} ); }
